alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 9:36PM CDT until March 23 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 936 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fordland, or 15 miles east of Ozark, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Rogersville, Seymour, Mansfield, Fordland, Dawson, Norwood, Hartville, Duncan, Diggins, Manes, Graff, Dogwood and Odin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
